item.description:
Hi Everyone,

As Always, everything depends on the weather and ground conditions..

 

I will arrive to get my ticket at 6:00 pm and will be be wearing my BRIGHT ORANGE HUNTING HAT near the ticket counter or ski rack by the lodge at bottom of slope  next to the check the ticket booth spot while bringing and putting on my ski things---> UNTILL 6:30 pm, then i am off to the top with or without you, but i am easy to spot while reaching the bottom of the slope with the Orange Hat on.

Too soon to know the weather, check back the day of the event for any changes...

------------

Mt Suthington is a small local mountain that is only 30 minutes from Hartford and OK for a simple evening excersize event during a work week.

This is a paddling group with a few events that will keep you a bit fit for paddling season start, we are not a ski group so the event is more social and some excersize.

 

The EVENING (6 PM TO 10 PM) ski event that is pretty local for most of us..

After 2.5 hours its usually enough of a challenge.

 

 

Ski Area:

http://www.mountsouthington.com/

 

When Dom's Way is open, then its more enjoyable for me :.

http://www.mountsouthington.com/content/map-and-statistics-mount-southington

 

Nights

6:00pm to 10:00pm

Holiday Periods:

Dec. 24th — Jan. 1
Christmas Eve, 12/24:  9am–4pm
Christmas Day, 12/25: CLOSED
New Year's Eve, 12/31: 9am–5pm
New Year's Day, 1/1: 9am–10pm

Martin Luther King Day, 1/21: 9am–10pm

President's Week, 2/18 — 2/22: 9am–10pm

 

Ticket Prices

Night 6-10pm Adults age 13 and older

$33

Special deals when they have em.:

http://www.mountsouthington.com/coupons

 

NOTE: ("Cross Country" skiing is dependent on the depth of snow at Northwest Park in Windsor.. this is the groups favored XC ski location..no fees..and they offer snowshoe or ski rentals for $10 per day if you need em..when the time is right------> i then post that info..)

 

 


Getting there: Use your GPS or some of the directions on the Mt Southington site or use the Meetup* map thing.

 

 

We can schedule a special meeting spot if you are arriving later..etc

I wish you all a good week..

al-r
